testsuite.name: item_completion.As a user, I want to use the TodoMVC app so that I can efficiently manage and organize my tasks

testcase.classname: item_completion.As a user, I want to use the TodoMVC app so that I can efficiently manage and organize my tasks
testcase.name: Item completion changes the list
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Item completion changes the list Given a Todo list with items "Work on assignment" & "Review assignment draft" ... passed in 0.145s When the first item is marked as complete ... passed in 0.022s Then only the second item is listed as active ... passed in 0.008s And the list summary is "1 item left!" ... passed in 10.013s And "Clear completed" is available ... passed in 0.026s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: item_completion.As a user, I want to use the TodoMVC app so that I can efficiently manage and organize my tasks
testcase.name: Completed items should not be visible in active filter
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Completed items should not be visible in active filter When the filter is set to "Active" ... passed in 3.032s Then only the second item is listed as active ... passed in 0.016s And the list summary is "1 item left!" ... passed in 10.013s And the route is "/active" ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: item_completion.As a user, I want to use the TodoMVC app so that I can efficiently manage and organize my tasks
testcase.name: Uncompleted items should not be visible in the completed filter
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Uncompleted items should not be visible in the completed filter When the filter is set to "Completed" ... passed in 2.051s Then only the first item is listed ... passed in 0.020s And the list summary is "1 item left!" ... passed in 10.013s And the route is "/completed" ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: item_completion.As a user, I want to use the TodoMVC app so that I can efficiently manage and organize my tasks
testcase.name: All completed items should not be visible in active filter
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: All completed items should not be visible in active filter When the filter is set to "Active" ... passed in 3.047s When the first item is marked as complete ... passed in 0.035s Then nothing is listed ... passed in 10.010s And the list summary is "0 items left!" ... passed in 10.022s And the route is "/active" ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: item_completion.As a user, I want to use the TodoMVC app so that I can efficiently manage and organize my tasks
testcase.name: Filtering completed items
testcase.failure: Failing step: And "Clear completed" is available ... undefined in 0.000s Location: features/item_completion.feature:36 None
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Filtering completed items When the filter is set to "All" ... passed in 3.054s And the first item is marked as complete ... passed in 0.035s And "Clear completed" is available ... undefined in 0.000s And the list summary is "1 item left!" ... undefined in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
